name: Stuck On Loop
description:
Controls:

  • move - ARROW KEYS / WASD
  • jump - SPACE
  • interact - Z
  • sprint - TAB
  • reset - ESC

Retrospecter (https://retrospecter.itch.io) and I did this game for LudemDare47.
We were inspired by the idea of games like calen's LonelyCylender, and wanted to make a cute atmospheric game about running around the world!

Leave a comment if you liked the game!
And if you're interested, give us a follow on le Twitter:

-https://twitter.com/ImPACIOble
-https://twitter.com/Bleggaman
